context: Commercial aerospace company, 30,000 employees, preparing for next-generation aircraft certification with new safety systems

request.purpose: Investment in advanced safety certification systems and testing facilities
request.justification: Meet evolving FAA/EASA safety standards and maintain competitive certification timelines

decision_process.outcome: Investment case validated with ROI projections
